content: I’m a professor and I see that many students do simply go through the motions and never really “get” how amazing the university experience can be--they never really learn how to learn, or, frankly, care to learn. BUT I fell in love with school and learned most of the items on your list during my undergrad degree, and I see other students doing this, too. Learning your list requires a strong work ethic and humility: two traits that most students don’t show up with, traits that some time off between high school and college could, I agree, help them acquire.
